page.title: 18A Monk's Day (Fr. Geoffrey).
page.content: 5:30 Get up(At the Grange guest house) 6:00 Matins (prayers) 6:20 Reading and meditation 7:15 Lauds 7:45 Shaves 8:00 Breakfast 8:50 Celebrate Mass 9:30 Attend on Abbot as secetary 10:30 Prepare talks and counsel guests 1:00 Midday office 1:15 Lunch at the Grange with guests { Afternoon Garden: cut grass etc. Tea and Welcome visiting groups 6:45 Vespers 7:15 Supper 8:15 Go down to Monastery 9:00 Compline 9:20 Read and bed Each monk within the Ampleforth Community builds his duties around this basic structure.
